chapters.title: Chapter 11: An Unexpected Letter
chapters.info: Melfane Dawlish, p. 177—Short, ample-cheeked niece of Essande and dispenser of herbs and ointments. She runs a shop on Candle Street in New Caemlyn. She is a midwife, and is now Elayne's midwife. She is very insistent that Elayne follow her instructions precisely, no exceptions.
